description:
A familiar pair returns, but something is different about them! Kazuma, Kawachi, and Kanmuri must do battle with a duo of ninjas using the local specialty of Omagari. Can Kazuma win even though both he and his opponent are using the same ingredients?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nin ! Nin ! Nin ! C`est mon Nindou !
Nin Nin Nin! My Way of the Ninja! Believe It!
Nin Nin Nin!! Ore no Nindou Dattebayo!
นินๆๆ นี่แหละวิถีนินจาของฉัน
ニンニンニン!! オレの忍道だってばよ!
